trans-unit.source: The butt value indicates that the stroke for each subpath does not extend beyond its two endpoints. On a zero length subpath, the path will not be rendered at all.
trans-unit.target: 在 butt 值表示每个子路径行程没有超出它的两个端点。在零长度的子路径上，该路径将完全不呈现。

trans-unit.source: The calcMode attribute specifies the interpolation mode for the animation.
The cap-height attribute defines the height of uppercase glyphs of the font within the font coordinate system.
The clip-path presentation attribute defines or associates a clipping path with the element it is related to.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clip-path 呈现属性定义或同伙与它相关的元件的剪切路径。

trans-unit.source: The clip-rule attribute only applies to graphics elements that are contained within a <clipPath> element. The clip-rule attribute basically works as the fill-rule attribute, except that it applies to <clipPath> definitions.
trans-unit.target: 的 clip-rule 属性只适用于被包含在内的图形元素 <clipPath> 元素。的 clip-rule 属性基本上作品作为 fill-rule 属性，不同之处在于它适用于 <clipPath> 定义。

trans-unit.source: The clip attribute is a presentation attribute defining the visible region of an element.
trans-unit.target: 该 clip 属性是定义一个元素的可见光区域的呈现属性。

trans-unit.source: The clipPathUnits attribute indicates which coordinate system to use for the contents of the <clipPath> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clipPathUnits 属性指示要使用的内容，其坐标系统 <clipPath> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The color-interpolation-filters attribute specifies the color space for imaging operations performed via filter effects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-interpolation-filters 属性指定成像操作的颜色空间通过过滤效果而进行。

trans-unit.source: The color-interpolation attribute specifies the color space for gradient interpolations, color animations, and alpha compositing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-interpolation 属性指定梯度内插，色彩动画，和alpha合成的颜色空间。

trans-unit.source: The color-profile attribute is used to define which color profile a raster image included through the <image> element should use.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-profile 属性用于定义哪些颜色配置文件通过包括光栅图像 <image> 元素应该使用。

trans-unit.source: The color-rendering attribute provides a hint to the SVG user agent about how to optimize its color interpolation and compositing operations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-rendering 属性提供一个提示，有关如何优化其颜色插值和合成操作的SVG用户代理。

trans-unit.source: The color attribute is used to provide a potential indirect value (currentColor) for the fill, stroke, stop-color, flood-color and lighting-color attributes.
trans-unit.target: 的 color 属性用于提供一个潜在的间接值（ currentColor 为） fill ， stroke ， stop-color ， flood-color 和 lighting-color 属性。

trans-unit.source: The color attribute is used to provide a potential indirect value, currentcolor, for the fill, stroke, stop-color, flood-color, and lighting-color attributes.
The contentScriptType attribute on the <svg> element specifies the default scripting language for the given document fragment.
trans-unit.target: 在 contentScriptType 上属性 <svg> 元素指定为给定文档片段的默认脚本语言。

trans-unit.source: The contentScriptType attribute specifies the default scripting language for the given document fragment on the <svg> element.
The contentStyleType attribute specifies the style sheet language for the given document fragment on the <svg> element.
The cursor attribute specifies the mouse cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over an element.
trans-unit.target: 的 cursor 属性指定当鼠标指针是在一个元素上的鼠标光标显示。

trans-unit.source: The cx attribute define the x-axis coordinate of a center point.
trans-unit.target: 在 cx 属性定义的中心点的x轴坐标。

trans-unit.source: The cy attribute define the y-axis coordinate of a center point.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cy 属性定义的中心点的y轴坐标。

trans-unit.source: The d attribute defines a path to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 的 d 属性定义要绘制的路径。

trans-unit.source: The descent attribute defines the maximum unaccented depth of the font.
The diffuseConstant attribute represant the kd value in the Phong lighting model. In SVG, this can be any non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 diffuseConstant 属性represant在KD值Phong光照模型。在SVG中，这可以是任何非负数。

trans-unit.source: The direction attribute specifies the base writing direction of text and the direction of embeddings and overrides (see unicode-bidi) for the Unicode bidirectional algorithm. For the direction attribute to have any effect on an element that does not by itself establish a new text chunk (such as a <tspan> element without absolute position adjustments due to x or y attributes), the unicode-bidi property's value must be embed or bidi-override.
trans-unit.target: 的 direction 属性指定基编写文本的方向和嵌入物和覆盖（见的方向 unicode-bidi ）为Unicode双向算法。为了使 direction 属性对本身不会建立新文本块的元素（例如，由于 x 或 y 属性而没有绝对位置调整的 <tspan> 元素）产生任何影响，必须嵌入 unicode-bidi 属性的值或bidi-override。

trans-unit.source: The direction attribute specifies the inline-base direction of a <text> or <tspan> element. It defines the start and end points of a line of text as used by the text-anchor and inline-size properties. It also may affect the direction in which characters are positioned if the unicode-bidi property's value is either embed or bidi-override.
The display and visibility properties have no effect on <switch> element processing. In particular, setting display:none on a child has no effect on the true/false testing for <switch> processing.

The display attribute also affects direct rendering into offscreen canvases, such as occurs with masks or clip paths. Thus, setting display: none on a child of a <mask> will prevent the given child element from being rendered as part of the mask. Similarly, setting display: none on a child of a <clipPath> element will prevent the given child element from contributing to the clipping path.
trans-unit.target: 的 display 属性也影响直接渲染到屏幕外的画布，如用掩模或夹路径发生。因此，将 display: none 设置为： <mask> 的子项上没有显示将阻止给定的子元素作为遮罩的一部分呈现。同样，在 <clipPath> 元素的子元素上设置 display: none 可以防止给定的子元素对剪切路径有所贡献。

trans-unit.source: The display attribute lets you control the rendering of graphical or container elements.
trans-unit.target: 通过 display 属性，您可以控制图形或容器元素的呈现。

trans-unit.source: The display attribute only affects the direct rendering of a given element, whereas it does not prevent elements from being referenced by other elements. For example, setting display: none on a <path> element will prevent that element from getting rendered directly onto the canvas, but the <path> element can still be referenced by a <textPath> element; furthermore, its geometry will be used in text-on-a-path processing even if the <path> has display: none.
trans-unit.target: 的 display 属性只影响一个给定元素的直接渲染，而它不能阻止元件从由其它元素被引用。例如，设置display：在 <path> 元素上不设置任何内容，将阻止该元素直接呈现到画布上，但是 <path> 元素仍然可以由 <textPath> 元素引用；此外，即使 <path> 显示为：none ，其几何也将用于路径文本处理。

trans-unit.source: The display attribute only affects the direct rendering of a given element, whereas it does not prevent elements from being referenced by other elements. For example, setting it to none on a <path> element will prevent that element from getting rendered directly onto the canvas, but the <path> element can still be referenced by a <textPath> element; furthermore, its geometry will be used in text-on-a-path processing even if the <path> has a display value of none.

The divisor attribute specifies the value by which the resulting number of applying the kernelMatrix of a <feConvolveMatrix> element to the input image color value is divided to yield the destination color value. A divisor that is the sum of all the matrix values tends to have an evening effect on the overall color intensity of the result.

The dominant-baseline attribute is used to determine or re-determine a scaled-baseline-table. A scaled-baseline-table is a compound value with three components: a baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline, a baseline-table and a baseline-table font-size. Some values of the property re-determine all three values; other only re-establish the baseline-table font-size. When the initial value, auto, would give an undesired result, this property can be used to explicitly set the desire scaled-baseline-table.
trans-unit.target: 的 dominant-baseline 属性被用于确定或重新确定按比例调整的基线表。缩放基准表是具有三个成分的复合值：主要基准的基线标识符，基准表和基准表字体大小。该属性的某些值可重新确定所有三个值。其他仅重新建立基线表的字体大小。当初始值auto给出不希望的结果时，此属性可用于显式设置期望的缩放基准表。

trans-unit.source: The dominant-baseline attribute specifies the dominant baseline, which is the baseline used to align the box’s text and inline-level contents. It also indicates the default alignment baseline of any boxes participating in baseline alignment in the box’s alignment context.
The dur attribute indicates the simple duration of an animation.
The dx attribute indicates a shift along the x-axis on the position of an element or its content.
trans-unit.target: 的 dx 属性指示上的元件或它的内容的位置沿着x轴的移位。

trans-unit.source: The dy attribute indicates a shift along the y-axis on the position of an element or its content.
trans-unit.target: 的 dy 属性指示上的元件或它的内容的位置沿y轴的位移。

trans-unit.source: The edgeMode attribute determines how to extend the input image as necessary with color values so that the matrix operations can be applied when the kernel is positioned at or near the edge of the input image.
trans-unit.target: 所述 edgeMode 属性确定如何将输入图像作为必要的颜色值延伸，使得可以当内核被定位在或接近输入图像的边缘施加的矩阵运算。

trans-unit.source: The elevation attribute represent the direction angle for the light source from the XY plane towards the z axis, in degrees. Note the positive Z-axis points towards the viewer of the content.
trans-unit.target: 的 elevation 属性表示的方向角从XY平面朝向z轴的光源，以度为单位。请注意，正Z轴指向内容的查看者。

trans-unit.source: The elevation attribute specifies the direction angle for the light source from the XY plane towards the Z-axis, in degrees. Note that the positive Z-axis points towards the viewer of the content.
The enable-background attribute specifies how the accumulation of the background image is managed.
The end attribute defines an end value for the animation that can constrain the active duration.

The externalResourcesRequired attribute is available on all container elements and to all elements which potentially can reference external resources. It specifies whether referenced resources that are not part of the current document are required for proper rendering of the given container element or graphics element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 externalResourcesRequired 属性可在所有的容器元素，并潜在地可引用外部资源的所有元素。它指定是否正确显示给定的容器元素或图形元素是否需要引用的资源（不是当前文档的一部分）。

trans-unit.source: The externalResourcesRequired attribute is not inheritable (from a sense of attribute value inheritance), but if set on a container element, its value will apply to all elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: 所述 externalResourcesRequired 属性是不可遗传的（从属性值继承的意义上），但如果容器元件上设置，它的值将适用于在容器内的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: The feMergeNode takes the result of another filter to be processed by its parent <feMerge>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 feMergeNode 花费其父另一个要处理的过滤器的结果 <feMerge> 。

trans-unit.source: The fill-opacity attribute is a presentation attribute defining the opacity of the paint server (color, gradient, pattern, etc) applied to a shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 fill-opacity 属性是定义涂料服务器（的不透明度呈现属性的颜色，梯度，图案应用到形状，等等）。

trans-unit.source: The fill-rule attribute is a presentation attribute defining the algorithm to use to determine the inside part of a shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 fill-rule 属性是定义要使用的算法，以确定一个呈现属性内的形状的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The fill-rule attribute provides two options for how the inside (that is, the area to be filled) of a shape is determined:
The fill-rule attribute provides two options for how the inside of a shape is determined:
trans-unit.target: 的 fill-rule 属性提供了一种形状的内部如何被确定两个选项：

trans-unit.source: The fill attribute has two different meaning: For shapes and text it's a presentation attribute that lets define the color (or any SVG paint servers like gradients or patterns) used to paint the element; for animation it lets define what is the final state of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 的 fill 属性有两个不同的意思：对于形状和文本它是一个呈现属性，允许限定的颜色（或任何SVG油漆服务器等梯度或图案）用于绘制元件; 对于动画，它可以定义动画的最终状态。

trans-unit.source: The fill attribute has two different meanings. For shapes and text it's a presentation attribute that defines the color (or any SVG paint servers like gradients or patterns) used to paint the element; for animation it defines the final state of the animation.
The filter attribute defines the filter effects defined by the <filter> element that shall be applied to its element.
trans-unit.target: 该 filter 属性定义了由定义的过滤效果 <filter> 其应当适用于它的元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: The filterRes attribute indicates the width and height of the intermediate images in pixels of a filter primitive.
The filterRes attribute takes the form x-pixels [y-pixels], and indicates the width and height of the intermediate images in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 所述 filterRes 属性采取以下形式 x-pixels [y-pixels] ，表示在像素中的中间图像的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The filterUnits attribute defines the coordinate system for attributes x, y, width and height.
trans-unit.target: 所述 filterUnits 属性定义属性的坐标系 x ， y ， width 和 height 。

trans-unit.source: The filterUnits attribute defines the coordinate system for the attributes x, y, width and height.

The flood-color attribute indicates what color to use to flood the current filter primitive subregion defined through the <feFlood> element. The keyword currentColor and ICC colors can be specified in the same manner as within a <paint> specification for the fill and stroke attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在 flood-color 属性指示什么颜色使用淹没通过定义的当前滤波器原始子区域 <feFlood> 元素。可以使用与<paint>规范中的 fill 和 stroke 属性相同的方式指定关键字 currentColor 和ICC颜色。

trans-unit.source: The flood-color attribute indicates what color to use to flood the current filter primitive subregion.
The flood-opacity attribute indicates the opacity value to use across the current filter primitive subregion defined through the <feFlood> element.
trans-unit.target: 的 flood-opacity 属性指示跨越通过定义的当前滤波器原始子区域使用不透明度值 <feFlood> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The flood-opacity attribute indicates the opacity value to use across the current filter primitive subregion.
The font-family attribute indicates which font family will be used to render the text, specified as a prioritized list of font family names and/or generic family names.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-family 属性指示哪些字体系列将被用来渲染文本，指定字体系列名称和/或通用系列名称的优先列表。

trans-unit.source: The font-size-adjust attribute allows authors to specify an aspect value for an element that will preserve the x-height of the first choice font in a substitute font.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-size-adjust 属性允许作者为将保存在一个替代字体的第一选择字体的x高度的元素指定一个方面的值。

trans-unit.source: The font-size attribute refers to the size of the font from baseline to baseline when multiple lines of text are set solid in a multiline layout environment.

The font-size attribute refers to the size of the font from baseline to baseline when multiple lines of text are set solid in a multiline layout environment. For SVG, if a <length> is provided without a unit identifier (e.g., an unqualified number such as 128), the browser processes the <length> as a height value in the current user coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 如果在多行布局环境中将多行文本设置为实线，则 font-size 属性是指从基线到基线的字体大小。对于SVG，如果提供的<length>没有单位标识符（例如，不合格的数字，例如128），则浏览器会将<length>作为当前用户坐标系中的高度值进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The font-stretch attribute indicates the desired amount of condensing or expansion in the glyphs used to render the text.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-stretch 属性指示冷凝或在用于呈现文本的字形膨胀所需量。

trans-unit.source: The font-style attribute specifies whether the text is to be rendered using a normal, italic or oblique face.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-style 属性指定的文本是否是使用正常，斜体或倾斜面被呈现。

trans-unit.source: The font-style attribute specifies whether the text is to be rendered using a normal, italic, or oblique face.
The font-variant attribute indicates whether the text is to be rendered using the normal glyphs for lowercase characters or using small-caps glyphs for lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant 属性指示文本是否将使用正常字形为小写字符或使用小型大写字形为小写字符被呈现。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant attribute indicates whether the text is to be rendered using variations of the fontʼs glyphs.
The font-weight attribute refers to the boldness or lightness of the glyphs used to render the text, relative to other fonts in the same font family.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-weight 属性指的是用于呈现文本，相对于在同一字体家族其它字体的字形的胆量或亮度。

trans-unit.source: The foreignObject element is a good way to embed XHTML in SVG. If you have longer texts, the HTML layout is more suitable and comfortable than the SVG text element. Another often cited use case is the embedding of formulas with MathML. For scientific applications of SVG this is a very good way to join both worlds.
trans-unit.target: 该 foreignObject 元素是一个好办法，在SVG嵌入XHTML。如果文本较长，则HTML布局比SVG text 元素更合适和舒适。另一个经常被引用的用例是在MathML中嵌入公式。对于SVG的科学应用来说，这是加入这两个世界的非常好的方法。

trans-unit.source: The format attribute indicates the format of the given font.
The fr attribute defines the radius of the focal point for the radial gradient.
The fx attribute defines the x-axis coordinate of the focal point for a radial gradient.
The fy attribute defines the y-axis coordinate of the focal point for a radial gradient.
The g1 attribute specifies a list of glyph names which identify a set of possible first glyphs in the kerning pair.
The g2 attribute specifies a list of glyph names which identify a set of possible second glyphs in the kerning pair.

The glyph-name attribute specifies the name of a glyph. It is recommended that glyph names be unique within a font. The glyph names can be used in situations where Unicode character numbers do not provide sufficient information to access the correct glyph, such as when there are multiple glyphs per Unicode character.
The glyph-orientation-horizontal attribute affects the amount that hte current text position advances as each glyph is rendered.
The glyph-orientation-vertical attribute affects the amount that hte current text position advances as each glyph is rendered.
The glyphRef element provides a single possible glyph to the referencing <altGlyph> substitution.
trans-unit.target: 所述 glyphRef 元件提供了一个单一可能字形到引用 <altGlyph> 取代。

trans-unit.source: The gradientTransform attribute contains the definition of an optional additional transformation from the gradient coordinate system onto the target coordinate system (i.e., userSpaceOnUse or objectBoundingBox). This allows for things such as skewing the gradient. This additional transformation matrix is post-multiplied to (i.e., inserted to the right of) any previously defined transformations, including the implicit transformation necessary to convert from object bounding box units to user space.
trans-unit.target: 所述 gradientTransform 属性包含坐标系由梯度可选的附加变换的定义到目标坐标系统（即，userSpaceOnUse或objectBoundingBox）。这允许诸如倾斜渐变之类的事情。该附加的转换矩阵被后乘到任何先前定义的转换（即插入到其右侧），包括从对象边界框单位转换为用户空间所必需的隐式转换。

trans-unit.source: The gradientUnits attribute defines the coordinate system for attributes x1, y1, x2 and y2 on the <linearGradient> element or for attributes cx, cy, r, fx, and fy on the <radialGradient>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 gradientUnits 属性定义的坐标系的属性 x1 ， y1 ， x2 和 y2 的上 <linearGradient> 元件或属性 cx ， cy ， r ， fx 和 fy 在 <radialGradient> 。

trans-unit.source: The gradientUnits attribute defines the coordinate system used for attributes specified on the gradient elements.

The hanging attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve hanging baseline alignment for horizontally oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system.
The height attribute defines the vertical length of an element in the user coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 height 属性定义的元素的在用户的垂直长度的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The horiz-adv-x attribute indicates the horizontal advance after rendering a glyph in horizontal orientation.
The horiz-origin-x attribute indicates the x-coordinate in the font coordinate system of the origin of a glyph to be used when drawing horizontally oriented text.
The horiz-origin-y attribute indicates the y-coordinate in the font coordinate system of the origin of a glyph to be used when drawing horizontally oriented text.
The href attribute defines a link to a resource as a reference URL. The exact meaning of that link depends on the context of each element using it.
trans-unit.target: 该 href 属性定义链接到一个资源作为参考URL。该链接的确切含义取决于使用它的每个元素的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The id attribute assigns a unique name to an element.

The ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve ideographic baseline alignment for horizontally oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system.
The image-rendering attribute provides a hint to the browser about how to make speed vs. quality tradeoffs as it performs image processing.
trans-unit.target: 的 image-rendering 属性提供一个提示，如何使速度与质量的权衡，因为它执行图像处理后的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The in2 attribute identifies the second input for the given filter primitive. It works exactly like the in attribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 in2 属性标识为给定的过滤器基元的第二输入端。它的工作原理与 in 属性相同。

trans-unit.source: The in attribute identifies input for the given filter primitive.
trans-unit.target: 的 in 对于给定的过滤器基元属性标识输入。

trans-unit.source: The k1 attribute defines one of the value to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive. If this attribute is not set, its default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 k1 属性定义值中的一个将被所述的内使用 arithmetic 所述的操作 <feComposite> 过滤器基元。如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The k1 attribute defines one of the values to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive.
The k2 attribute defines one of the value to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive. If this attribute is not set, its default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 的 k2 属性定义值中的一个将被所述的内使用 arithmetic 所述的操作 <feComposite> 过滤器基元。如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The k2 attribute defines one of the values to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive.
The k3 attribute defines one of the value to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive. If this attribute is not set, its default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 k3 属性定义值中的一个将被所述的内使用 arithmetic 所述的操作 <feComposite> 过滤器基元。如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The k3 attribute defines one of the values to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive.
The k4 attribute defines one of the value to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive. If this attribute is not set, its default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 k4 属性定义值中的一个将被所述的内使用 arithmetic 所述的操作 <feComposite> 过滤器基元。如果未设置此属性，则其默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The k4 attribute defines one of the values to be used within the the arithmetic operation of the <feComposite> filter primitive.
The k attribute specifies the amount for decreasing the spacing between the two glyphs in a kerning pair.
The kernelUnitLength attribute has two meaning based on the context it's used.
trans-unit.target: 该 kernelUnitLength 属性具有基于它的使用方面的两个含义。

trans-unit.source: The kernelUnitLength attribute has two meanings based on the context it's used in. For lighting filter primitives, it indicates the intended distance for the x and y coordinates, for <feConvolveMatrix>, it indicates the intended distance between successive columns and rows in the kernel matrix.

The kerning attribute indicates whether the browser should adjust inter-glyph spacing based on kerning tables that are included in the relevant font (i.e., enable auto-kerning) or instead disable auto-kerning and instead set inter-character spacing to a specific length (typically, zero).
trans-unit.target: 的 kerning 属性指示浏览器是否应该调整帧间字形基于字距被包括在相关字体表间隔（即，使能自动字距）或代替禁用自动字距，而是设置字符间间距为特定长度（通常为零）。

trans-unit.source: The kerning attribute indicates whether the spacing between glyphs should be adjusted based on kerning tables that are included in the relevant font (i.e., enable auto-kerning) or instead disable auto-kerning and set the spacing between them to a specific length (typically, zero).
The keyPoints attribute indicates the simple duration of an animation.
The keySplines attribute defines a set of Bézier curve control points associated with the keyTimes list, defining a cubic Bézier function that controls interval pacing.

The keyTimes attribute is a semicolon-separated list of time values used to control the pacing of the animation. Each time in the list corresponds to a value in the values attribute list, and defines when the value is used in the animation. Each time value in the keyTimes list is specified as a floating point value between 0 and 1 (inclusive), representing a proportional offset into the duration of the animation element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 keyTimes 属性是用于控制动画的起搏时间值的分号分隔的列表。列表中的每个时间都对应于 values 属性列表中的一个值，并定义何时在动画中使用该值。 keyTimes 列表中的每个时间值都指定为0到1（含）之间的浮点值，表示动画元素持续时间的比例偏移。

trans-unit.source: The keyTimes attribute represents a list of time values used to control the pacing of the animation. Each time in the list corresponds to a value in the values attribute list, and defines when the value is used in the animation. Each time value in the keyTimes list is specified as a floating point value between 0 and 1 (inclusive), representing a proportional offset into the duration of the animation element.
The keyTimes list semantics depends upon the interpolation mode:
trans-unit.target: 该 keyTimes 列表语义取决于插补方式：

trans-unit.source: The lang attribute specifies the primary language used in contents and attributes containing text content of particular elements.
The letter-spacing attribute controls spacing between text characters, in addition to any spacing from the kerning attribute.
trans-unit.target: 的 letter-spacing 属性控件文本字符之间的间隔，在除了从任何间距 kerning 属性。

trans-unit.source: The letter-spacing attribute in SVG is poorly supported. As of May 2018, Firefox ignores letter-spacing and renders text without. Chrome does render text with spaced letters, but improperly computes the text length; textNode.getComputedTextLength() returns exactly the same length whether letter-spacing is set or not, producing grossly incorrect results when letters are spaced.
trans-unit.target: SVG中的 letter-spacing 属性很少得到支持。截至2018年5月，Firefox 忽略了 letter-spacing 并且不显示文字。Chrome浏览器确实使用间隔字母显示文本，但计算出的文本长度不正确；无论是否设置了 letter-spacing textNode.getComputedTextLength() 都将返回完全相同的长度，当字母间距时会产生严重错误的结果。

trans-unit.source: The lighting-color attribute defines the color of the light source for filter primitives elements <feDiffuseLighting> and <feSpecularLighting>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 lighting-color 属性定义了光源，用于过滤原语元素的颜色 <feDiffuseLighting> 和 <feSpecularLighting> 。

trans-unit.source: The lighting-color attribute defines the color of the light source for lighting filter primitives.

The limitingConeAngle attribute represents the angle in degrees between the spot light axis (i.e. the axis between the light source and the point to which it is pointing at) and the spot light cone. So it defines a limiting cone which restricts the region where the light is projected. No light is projected outside the cone.
trans-unit.target: 所述 limitingConeAngle 属性表示的斑点光轴之间度的角度（即，在光源与其所指向的点之间的轴）和斑点光锥。因此，它定义了一个限制锥，它限制了光线投射的区域。没有光投射到圆锥体外部。

trans-unit.source: The local attribute specifies the unique ID for a locally stored color profile as specified by International Color Consortium.
The marker-end attribute defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at the final vertex of the given shape.

The marker-end defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at the final vertex of the given <path> element or basic shape. Note that for a <path> element which ends with a closed sub-path, the last vertex is the same as the initial vertex on the given sub-path. In this case, if marker-end does not equal none, then it is possible that two markers will be rendered on the given vertex. One way to prevent this is to set marker-end to none. (Note that the same comment applies to <polygon> elements.)
trans-unit.target: 的 marker-end 定义了将在给定的最终顶点要绘制的箭头或多标记 <path> 元件或基本形状。请注意，对于以封闭子路径结尾的 <path> 元素，最后一个顶点与给定子路径上的初始顶点相同。在这种情况下，如果 marker-end 不等于none，则有可能在给定的顶点上渲染两个marker。防止这种情况的一种方法是将 marker-end 设置为none。 （请注意，同一注释也适用于 <polygon> 元素。）

trans-unit.source: The marker-mid attribute defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at all interior vertices of the given shape.
The marker-mid defines the arrowhead or polymarker that shall be drawn at every vertex other than the first and last vertex of the given <path> element or basic shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 marker-mid 限定了应在大于给定的第一和最后一个顶点其他每个顶点要绘制的箭头或多标记 <path> 元件或基本形状。

trans-unit.source: The marker-start attribute defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at the first vertex of the given shape.
The marker-start attribute defines the arrowhead or polymarker that will be drawn at the first vertex of the given <path> element or basic shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 marker-start 属性定义了将在给定的第一个顶点要绘制的箭头或多标记 <path> 元件或基本形状。

trans-unit.source: The markerHeight attribute represents the height of the viewport into which the <marker> is to be fitted when it is rendered according to the viewBox and preserveAspectRatio attributes.
The markerHeight represents the height of the viewport into which the <marker> is to be fitted when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 所述 markerHeight 表示视到其中的高度 <marker> 是当它呈现给被装配。

trans-unit.source: The markerUnits attribute defines the coordinate system for the markerWidth and markerUnits attributes and the contents of the <marker>.
The markerUnits attribute defines the coordinate system for the attributes markerWidth, markerHeight and the contents of the <marker>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 markerUnits 属性定义的坐标系的属性 markerWidth ， markerHeight 和的内容 <marker> 。

trans-unit.source: The markerWidth attribute represents the width of the viewport into which the <marker> is to be fitted when it is rendered according to the viewBox and preserveAspectRatio attributes.
The markerWidth represents the width of the viewport into which the <marker> is to be fitted when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 所述 markerWidth 表示视到其中的宽度 <marker> 是当它呈现给被装配。

trans-unit.source: The mask attribute is a presentation attribute mainly used to bind a given <mask> element with the element the attribute belong to.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mask 属性是主要用于一个给定的结合呈现属性 <mask> 与元件属于属性元素。

trans-unit.source: The mask attribute is a presentation attribute mainly used to bind a given <mask> element with the element the attribute belongs to.
The maskContentUnits attribute indicates which coordinate system to use for the contents of the <mask> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 maskContentUnits 属性指示哪个坐标系统使用的内容 <mask> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The maskUnits attribute indicates which coordinate system to use for the geometry properties of the <mask> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 maskUnits 属性指示哪个坐标系统使用的的几何性质 <mask> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The mathematical attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve mathematical baseline alignment for horizontally oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system.

The matrix(<a> <b> <c> <d> <e> <f>) transform function specifies a transformation in the form of a transformation matrix of six values. matrix(a,b,c,d,e,f) is equivalent to applying the transformation matrix:
trans-unit.target: 的 matrix(<a> <b> <c> <d> <e> <f>) 变换函数指定在六个值的变换矩阵的形式的变换。 matrix(a,b,c,d,e,f) 等同于应用变换矩阵：

trans-unit.source: The matrix(<a> <b> <c> <d> <e> <f>) transform function specifies a transformation in the form of a transformation matrix of six values. matrix(a,b,c,d,e,f) is equivalent to applying the transformation matrix:
The max attribute specifies the maximum value of the active animation duration.
The method attribute indicates the method by which text should be rendered along the path of a <textPath> element.
The min attribute specifies the minimum value of the active animation duration.

The miter-clip value indicates that a sharp corner is to be used to join path segments. The corner is formed by extending the outer edges of the stroke at the tangents of the path segments until they intersect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 miter-clip 值指示尖角要被用于连接路径段。通过在路径段的切线处延伸笔触的外边缘直到它们相交，来形成拐角。

trans-unit.source: The miter value indicates that a sharp corner is to be used to join path segments. The corner is formed by extending the outer edges of the stroke at the tangents of the path segments until they intersect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 miter 值表示尖角要被用于连接路径段。通过在路径段的切线处延伸笔触的外边缘直到它们相交，来形成拐角。

trans-unit.source: The mode attribute defines the blending mode on the <feBlend> filter primitive.
trans-unit.target: 的 mode 属性定义在混合模式 <feBlend> 过滤器基元。

trans-unit.source: The numOctaves parameter for the noise function of the <feTurbulence> primitive.
trans-unit.target: <feTurbulence> 原语的噪声函数的 numOctaves 参数。

trans-unit.source: The opacity attribute specifies the transparency of an object or of a group of objects, that is, the degree to which the background behind the element is overlaid.
trans-unit.target: 所述 opacity 属性指定的对象或一组对象，即的透明度，在何种程度上的元件后面的背景是重叠的。

trans-unit.source: The operator attribute as two meaning based on the context it's used.
trans-unit.target: 该 operator 的两个属性含义基于它的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The operator attribute has two meanings based on the context itʼs used in. Either it defines the compositing or morphing operation to be performed.
The overflow attribute has the same parameter values as defined for the css overflow property. However, the following additional points apply:
trans-unit.target: 该 overflow 作为用于定义属性具有相同的参数值 css overflow property 。但是，还需要注意以下几点：

trans-unit.source: The overflow attribute only applies to elements that establish new viewports (see below), <pattern> elements and <marker> elements. For all other elements, the property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 所述 overflow 属性仅适用于建立新的视口（见下文），元素 <pattern> 元素和 <marker> 元素。对于所有其他元素，该属性无效。

trans-unit.source: The overflow attribute sets what to do when an element's content is too big to fit in its block formatting context. It has the same parameter values and meaning as the css overflow property, however, the following additional points apply:
The overline-position attribute represents the ideal vertical position of the overline. The overline position is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 该 overline-position 属性表示划线的理想垂直位置。上划线位置以字体的坐标系表示。

trans-unit.source: The overline-thickness attribute represents the ideal thickness of the overline. The overline thickness is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 该 overline-thickness 属性表示划线的理想厚度。上划线的粗细以字体的坐标系表示。

trans-unit.source: The paint-order attribute specifies the order that the fill, stroke, and markers of a given shape or text element are painted.

The paint-order attribute specifies the order that the fill, stroke, and markers of a given shape or text element are painted. Its default value is normal, which indicates that the fill will be painted first, then the stroke, and finally the markers. To specify a different order, a white space separated list of keywords fill, stroke, and markers can be used. If any of the three painting components is omitted, then they will be painted in their default order after the specified components. For example, using stroke is equivalent to stroke fill markers.
trans-unit.target: paint-order 属性指定给定形状或文本元素的填充，描边和标记的绘制顺序。它的默认值是normal，它指示将首先绘制填充，然后绘制笔触，最后绘制标记。要指定其他顺序，可以使用由空格分隔的关键字列表fill，stroke和markers。如果省略了三个绘制组件中的任何一个，则将在指定组件之后按照默认顺序绘制它们。例如，使用笔触等效于笔划填充标记。

trans-unit.source: The panose-1 attribute indicates the Panose-1 number of a font face.

The pathLength attribute lets authors specify a total length for the path, in user units. This value is then used to calibrate the browser's distance calculations with those of the author, by scaling all distance computations using the ratio pathLength/(computed value of path length).
trans-unit.target: 的 pathLength 属性允许作者指定的总长度的路径，以用户为单位。然后通过使用 pathLength /（计算出的路径长度值）缩放所有距离计算，使用该值与作者的浏览器距离计算进行校准。

trans-unit.source: The patternContentUnits attribute indicates which coordinate system to use for the contents of the <pattern> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 patternContentUnits 属性指示哪个坐标系统使用的内容 <pattern> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The patternTransform attribute defines a list of transform definitions that are applied to a pattern tile.
trans-unit.target: 所述 patternTransform 属性定义的列表变换的定义被应用到一个图案瓦片。

trans-unit.source: The patternUnits attribute indicates which coordinate system to use for the geometry properties of the <pattern> element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 patternUnits 属性指示哪个坐标系统使用的的几何性质 <pattern> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The pointer-events attribute is a presentation attribute that allows defining whether or when an element may be the target of a mouse event.
The pointer-events attribute is a presentation attribute that lets define whether or when an element may be the target of a mouse event.
trans-unit.target: 的 pointer-events 属性是一个呈现属性，允许定义一个元素是否时可以是鼠标事件的目标。

trans-unit.source: The points attribute defines a list of points. Each point is defined by a pair of number representing a X and a Y coordinate in the user coordinate system. If the attribute contains an odd number of coordinates, the last one will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 points 属性定义点的列表。每个点由代表用户坐标系中X和Y坐标的一对数字定义。如果属性包含奇数个坐标，则最后一个将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The pointsAtX attribute represent the X location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointsAtX 属性表示由属性确定的坐标系中的X位置 primitiveUnits 的上 <filter> 在其中光源被指向的点的元件。

trans-unit.source: The pointsAtX attribute represents the x location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing.
The pointsAtY attribute represent the Y location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointsAtY 属性表示由属性确定的坐标系的Y位置 primitiveUnits 的上 <filter> 在其中光源被指向的点的元件。

trans-unit.source: The pointsAtY attribute represents the y location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing.

The pointsAtZ attribute represent the X location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing, assuming that, in the initial coordinate system, the positive Z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the Z-axis equals one unit in X and Y.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pointsAtZ 属性表示由属性确定的坐标系中的X位置 primitiveUnits 的上 <filter> 在其中光源被指向的点的元素，假设，初始坐标系中，正Z轴出来朝向观看内容并假定沿Z轴的一个单位等于X和Y的一个人。

trans-unit.source: The pointsAtZ attribute represents the y location in the coordinate system established by attribute primitiveUnits on the <filter> element of the point at which the light source is pointing, assuming that, in the initial local coordinate system, the positive z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the z-axis equals one unit in x and y.
The preserveAspectRatio attribute indicates how an element with a viewBox providing a given aspect ratio must fit into a viewport with a different aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 所述 preserveAspectRatio 属性指示如何与一个视框提供给定的纵横比的元件必须适合具有不同纵横比的视口。

trans-unit.source: The preserveAspectRatio attribute specifies that the aspect ratio must be preserved by centering the picture in the available size, sizing to the maximum of the height or width and then cutting off any overflow.
The primitiveUnits attribute specifies the coordinate system for the various length values within the filter primitives and for the attributes that define the filter primitive subregion.
trans-unit.target: 所述 primitiveUnits 属性指定坐标系的过滤器基元内和用于定义滤波器原始分区的属性的各种长度的值。

trans-unit.source: The r attribute defines the radius of a circle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 r 属性定义一个圆的半径。

trans-unit.source: The radius attribute represent the radius for the operation on a given <feMorphology> filter primitive. If two <number>s are provided, the first number represents a x-radius and the second value represents a y-radius. If one number is provided, then that value is used for both X and Y. The values are in the coordinate system established by the primitiveUnits attribute on the <filter> element.
trans-unit.target: 的 radius 属性表示用于在给定的操作半径 <feMorphology> 过滤器基元。如果提供两个<number>，则第一个数字表示x半径，第二个值表示y半径。如果提供一个数字，则该值将同时用于X和Y。这些值在 <filter> 元素上的 primitiveUnits 属性建立的坐标系中。

trans-unit.source: The radius attribute represents the radius (or radii) for the operation on a given <feMorphology> filter primitive.

The rect will not be painted, however. Instead its pixel data will be used to determine, which pixels of the circle "make it" to the final rendering. Since the rectangle covers only the upper half of the circle, the lower half of the circle will vanish:
trans-unit.target: 该 rect 将不会被涂然而，。取而代之的是，将使用其像素数据来确定圆的哪些像素“使其”到达最终渲染。由于矩形仅覆盖圆的上半部分，因此圆的下半部分将消失：

trans-unit.source: The refX attribute defines the x coordinate of an element’s reference point.
The refY attribute defines the y coordinate of an element’s reference point.
The repeatCount attribute indicates the number of times an animation will take place.

The result attribute defines the assigned name for this filter primitive. If supplied, then graphics that result from processing this filter primitive can be referenced by an in attribute on a subsequent filter primitive within the same <filter> element. If no value is provided, the output will only be available for re-use as the implicit input into the next filter primitive if that filter primitive provides no value for its in attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该 result 属性定义了该滤波器的原始分配的名称。如果提供的话，则可以通过 in 同一 <filter> 元素内的后续过滤器基元上的in属性引用由处理此过滤器基元而得到的图形。如果未提供任何值，则该过滤器原语不为其 in 属性提供任何值，则该输出将仅可作为下一个过滤器原语的隐式输入来重新使用。

trans-unit.source: The result attribute defines the assigned name for this filter primitive. If supplied, then graphics that result from processing this filter primitive can be referenced by an in attribute on a subsequent filter primitive within the same <filter> element. If no value is provided, the output will only be available for re-use as the implicit input into the next filter primitive if that filter primitive provides no value for its in attribute.

The rotate(<a> [<x> <y>]) transform function specifies a rotation by a degrees about a given point. If optional parameters x and y are not supplied, the rotation is about the origin of the current user coordinate system. If optional parameters x and y are supplied, the rotate is about the point (x, y).
trans-unit.target: 的 rotate(<a> [<x> <y>]) 通过变换函数指定旋转 a 度约一个给定的点。如果未提供可选参数 x 和 y ，则旋转大约是当前用户坐标系的原点。如果提供了可选参数 x 和 y ，则旋转绕点 (x, y) 。

trans-unit.source: The rotate(<a> [<x> <y>]) transform function specifies a rotation by a degrees about a given point. If optional parameters x and y are not supplied, the rotation is about the origin of the current user coordinate system. If optional parameters x and y are supplied, the rotation is about the point (x, y).
The rotate attribute specifies how the animated element rotates as it travels along a path specified in an <animateMotion> element.
The round value indicates that a round corner is to be used to join path segments.
trans-unit.target: 该 round 值表示圆角要被用于连接路径段。

trans-unit.source: The round value indicates that at the end of each subpath the stroke will be extended by a half circle with a diameter equal to the stroke width. On a zero length subpath, the stroke consists of a full circle centered at the subpath's point.
trans-unit.target: 该 round 值表示在每个子路径的行程将半圆的直径被扩展的端部等于笔划宽度。在长度为零的子路径上，笔划由一个以子路径的点为中心的完整圆组成。

trans-unit.source: The rx attribute defines a radius on the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rx 属性定义在x轴的半径。

trans-unit.source: The ry attribute defines a radius on the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ry 属性定义在y轴的半径。

trans-unit.source: The scale(<x> [<y>]) transform function specifies a scale operation by x and y. If y is not provided, it is assumed to be equal to x.
trans-unit.target: 的 scale(<x> [<y>]) 通过变换函数指定缩放操作 x 和 y 。如果未提供 y ，则假定它等于 x 。

trans-unit.source: The scale(<x> [<y>]) transform function specifies a scale operation by x and y. If y is not provided, it is assumed to be equal to x.

The scale attribute define the displacement scale factor to be used on a <feDisplacementMap> filter primitive. The amount is expressed in the coordinate system established by the primitiveUnits attribute on the <filter> element.
trans-unit.target: 的 scale 属性定义要在使用的位移标尺因子 <feDisplacementMap> 过滤器基元。数量表示在由 <filter> 元素上的 primitiveUnits 属性建立的坐标系中。

trans-unit.source: The scale attribute defines the displacement scale factor to be used on a <feDisplacementMap> filter primitive. The amount is expressed in the coordinate system established by the primitiveUnits attribute on the <filter> element.
The seed attribute represents the starting number for the pseudo random number generator of the <feTurbulence> primitive.
trans-unit.target: 所述 seed 属性表示所述的伪随机数发生器的起始编号 <feTurbulence> 原语。

trans-unit.source: The shape-rendering attribute provides hints to the renderer about what tradeoffs to make when rendering shapes like paths, circles, or rectangles.
The skewX(<a>) transform function specifies a skew transformation along the x axis by a degrees.
trans-unit.target: 所述 skewX(<a>) 变换函数指定沿x歪斜变换由轴线 a 度。

trans-unit.source: The skewX(<a>) transform function specifies a skew transformation along the x axis by a degrees.
The skewY(<a>) transform function specifies a skew transformation along the y axis by a degrees.
trans-unit.target: 的 skewY(<a>) 通过变换函数指定沿y轴的偏斜变换 a 度。

trans-unit.source: The skewY(<a>) transform function specifies a skew transformation along the y axis by a degrees.
The slope attribute indicates the vertical stroke angle of a font.
The specularConstant attribute controls the ratio of reflection of the specular lighting. It represents the ks value in the Phong lighting model. The bigger the value the stronger the reflection.
The specularConstant attribute represents the ks value in the Phong lighting model. In SVG, this can be any non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 specularConstant 属性表示在KS值Phong光照模型。在SVG中，这可以是任何非负数。

trans-unit.source: The specularExponent attribute controls the focus for the light source, a larger value indicate a more "shiny" light.
trans-unit.target: 所述 specularExponent 属性控制聚焦的光源，较大的值表示更“有光泽”的光。

trans-unit.source: The specularExponent attribute controls the focus for the light source. The bigger the value the brighter the light.
The spreadMethod attribute applies to gradient paint elements: linearGradient and radialGradient. It determines how a shape is filled beyond the defined edges of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 所述 spreadMethod 属性适用于梯度涂料元素：的LinearGradient和的RadialGradient。它确定如何在渐变的定义边缘之外填充形状。

trans-unit.source: The spreadMethod attribute determines how a shape is filled beyond the defined edges of a gradient.

The square value indicates that at the end of each subpath the stroke will be extended by a rectangle with a width equal to half the width of the stroke and a height equal to the width of the stroke. On a zero length subpath, the stroke consists of a square with its width equal to the stroke width, centered at the subpath's point.
trans-unit.target: 的 square 值表示在每个子路径的端部的行程将由具有宽度等于所述冲程和高度的宽度的一半等于该笔划的宽度的矩形延伸。在长度为零的子路径上，笔划由一个正方形组成，该正方形的宽度等于笔划宽度，并以子路径的点为中心。

trans-unit.source: The stdDeviation attribute defines the standard deviation for the blur operation. If two <number>s are provided, the first number represents a standard deviation value along the x-axis. The second value represents a standard deviation along the y-axis. If one number is provided, then that value is used for both X and Y.
trans-unit.target: 所述 stdDeviation 属性定义了模糊操作的标准偏差。如果提供两个<number>，则第一个数字代表沿x轴的标准偏差值。第二个值代表沿y轴的标准偏差。如果提供一个数字，则该值将同时用于X和Y。

trans-unit.source: The stemh attribute indicates the horizontal stem width of the font.
The stemv attribute indicates the vertical stem width of the font.
The stitchTiles attribute defines how the Perlin tiles behave at the border.
trans-unit.target: 该 stitchTiles 属性定义培林如何在边境瓷砖的行为。

trans-unit.source: The stop-color attribute indicates what color to use at a gradient stop.

The stop-color attribute indicates what color to use at that gradient stop. The keyword currentColor and ICC colors can be specified in the same manner as within a <paint> specification for the fill and stroke attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在 stop-color 属性表示什么颜色在那个渐变停止使用。可以使用与<paint>规范中的 fill 和 stroke 属性相同的方式指定关键字 currentColor 和ICC颜色。

trans-unit.source: The stop-opacity attribute defines the opacity of a given color gradient stop.
The stop-opacity attribute defines the opacity of a given gradient stop.
trans-unit.target: 在 stop-opacity 属性定义在给定渐变停止的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The strikethrough-position attribute represents the ideal vertical position of the strikethrough. The strikethrough position is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 strikethrough-position 属性表示删除线的理想的垂直位置。删除线位置在字体的坐标系中表示。

trans-unit.source: The strikethrough-thickness attribute represents the ideal thickness of the strikethrough. The strikethrough thickness is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 strikethrough-thickness 属性表示删除线的理想厚度。删除线粗细以字体的坐标系表示。

trans-unit.source: The string attribute is a hint to the user agent, and specifies a list of formats that the font referenced by the parent <font-face-uri> element supports.
The stroke-dasharray attribute is a presentation attribute defining the pattern of dashes and gaps used to paint the outline of the shape;
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-dasharray 属性是定义用于绘制形状的轮廓虚线和间隙的图案的呈现属性;

trans-unit.source: The stroke-dashoffset attribute is a presentation attribute defining an offset on the rendering of the associated dash array.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-dashoffset 属性是限定在相关联的虚线数组的呈现偏移的呈现属性。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-linecap attribute is a presentation attribute defining the shape to be used at the end of open subpaths when they are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-linecap 属性是在开放子路径的端部要使用限定的形状的呈现属性它们被抚摸时。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-linejoin attribute is a presentation attribute defining the shape to be used at the corners of paths when they are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-linejoin 属性是定义在路径拐角要使用它们抚摸时的形状的呈现属性。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-miterlimit attribute is a presentation attribute defining a limit on the ratio of the miter length to the stroke-width used to draw a miter join. When the limit is exceeded, the join is converted from a miter to a bevel.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-miterlimit 属性是斜接长度与比例限定极限的呈现属性 stroke-width 用于绘制一个斜接连接。超过限制时，连接将从斜接转换为斜角。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-opacity attribute is a presentation attribute defining the opacity of the paint server (color, gradient, pattern, etc) applied to the stroke of a shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-opacity 属性是定义涂料服务器（的不透明度呈现属性的颜色，梯度，图案施加到形状的行程等）。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-width attribute is a presentation attribute defining the width of the stroke to be applied to the shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-width 属性是定义笔划的宽度呈现属性要被施加到的形状。

trans-unit.source: The stroke-width property defines the width of this stroke. Strokes are drawn centered around the path. In the example above, the path is shown in pink, and the stroke in black.
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke-width 属性定义该笔划的宽度。以路径为中心绘制笔画。在上面的示例中，路径显示为粉红色，笔触显示为黑色。

trans-unit.source: The stroke attribute is a presentation attribute defining the color (or any SVG paint servers like gradients or patterns) used to paint the outline of the shape;
trans-unit.target: 的 stroke 属性是定义颜色（一个呈现属性或任何SVG油漆服务器等梯度或图案）用于绘制形状的轮廓;

trans-unit.source: The style attribute allows to style an element using CSS declarations. It functions identically to the style attribute in HTML.
The style attribute pins the SVG element to the background of the form.
The style attribute specifies style information for its element. It functions identically to the style attribute in HTML.
trans-unit.target: 该 style 属性指定样式信息对其元素。它的功能与HTML中的 style 属性相同。

trans-unit.source: The surfaceScale attribute represent the height of the surface for a light filter primitive. If the attribute is not specified, then the effect is as if a value of 1 were specified.
trans-unit.target: 所述 surfaceScale 属性表示表面的高度的调光滤光器基元。如果未指定该属性，则效果就像指定了值1一样。

trans-unit.source: The svg element is a container that defines a new coordinate system and viewport. It is used as the outermost element of SVG documents, but it can also be used to embed an SVG fragment inside an SVG or HTML document.

The svg element is a container that defines a new coordinate system and viewport. It is used as the outermost element of any SVG document but it can also be used to embed a SVG fragment inside any SVG or HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 的 svg 元素是定义了新的坐标系和容器视口。它用作任何SVG文档的最外层元素，但也可以用于将SVG片段嵌入任何SVG或HTML文档中。

trans-unit.source: The systemLanguage attribute represents a list of supported language tags. This list is matched against the language defined in the user preferences.
The tabindex SVG attribute allows you to control whether an element is focusable and to define the relative order of the element for the purposes of sequential focus navigation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 tabindex SVG属性，可以控制一个元素是否可获得焦点和定义元件的用于顺序焦点导航的目的，相对顺序。

trans-unit.source: The tabindex attribute allows you to control whether an element is focusable and to define the relative order of the element for the purposes of sequential focus navigation.

The targetX attribute determines the positioning in X of the convolution matrix relative to a given target pixel in the input image. The leftmost column of the matrix is column number zero. The value must be such that: 0 <= targetX < orderX. By default, the convolution matrix is centered in X over each pixel of the input image (i.e., targetX = floor ( orderX / 2 )).
trans-unit.target: 所述 targetX 属性确定卷积矩阵相对的X到在输入图像中的给定目标像素的定位。矩阵的最左列是零列。该值必须是使得：0 <= targetX < order X 。默认情况下，卷积矩阵在输入图像的每个像素上的X中心（即 targetX = floor ( orderX / 2 ) ）。

trans-unit.source: The targetX attribute determines the positioning in horizontal direction of the convolution matrix relative to a given target pixel in the input image. The leftmost column of the matrix is column number zero. The value must be such that: 0 <= targetX < orderX.

The targetY attribute determines the positioning in Y of the convolution matrix relative to a given target pixel in the input image. The topmost row of the matrix is row number zero. The value must be such that: 0 <= targetY < orderY. By default, the convolution matrix is centered in Y over each pixel of the input image (i.e., targetY = floor ( orderY / 2 )).
trans-unit.target: 所述 targetY 属性确定在卷积矩阵的Y量相对于输入图像中的给定目标像素的定位。矩阵的最上一行是零行。该值必须满足以下条件：0 <= targetY < Y order 。默认情况下，卷积矩阵在输入图像的每个像素上以Y为中心（即 targetY = floor ( orderY / 2 ) ）。

trans-unit.source: The targetY attribute determines the positioning in vertical direction of the convolution matrix relative to a given target pixel in the input image. The topmost row of the matrix is row number zero. The value must be such that: 0 <= targetY < orderY.

The text-anchor attribute is applied to each individual text chunk within a given <text> element. Each text chunk has an initial current text position, which represents the point in the user coordinate system resulting from (depending on context) application of the x and y attributes on the <text> element, any x or y attribute values on a <tspan>, <tref> or <altGlyph> element assigned explicitly to the first rendered character in a text chunk, or determination of the initial current text position for a <textPath> element.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-anchor 属性应用于每个单独的文本块的给定内 <text> 元素。每个文本块都有一个初始的当前文本位置，该位置代表用户坐标系中的点，该点是由于（取决于上下文）应用 <text> 元素上的 x 和 y 属性， <tspan> 上的任何 x 或 y 属性值而产生的>， <tref> 或 <altGlyph> 元素已显式分配给文本块中的第一个呈现字符，或者确定了 <textPath> 元素的初始当前文本位置。

trans-unit.source: The text-anchor attribute is applied to each individual text chunk within a given <text> element. Each text chunk has an initial current text position, which represents the point in the user coordinate system resulting from (depending on context) application of the x and y attributes on the <text> element, any x or y attribute values on a <tspan>, <tref> or <altGlyph> element assigned explicitly to the first rendered character in a text chunk, or determination of the initial current text position for a <textPath> element.

The text-anchor attribute is used to align (start-, middle- or end-alignment) a string of pre-formatted text or auto-wrapped text where the wrapping area is determined from the inline-size property relative to a given point. It is not applicable to other types of auto-wrapped text. For those cases you should use text-align. For multi-line text, the alignment takes place for each line.
The text-anchor attribute is used to align (start-, middle- or end-alignment) a string of text relative to a given point.
trans-unit.target: 的 text-anchor 属性用于对齐（开始- ，中型或端对准）相文本字符串，以一个给定的点。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration attribute defines whether text is decorated with an underline, overline and/or strike-through. It is a shorthand for the text-decoration-line and text-decoration-style properties.
The text-decoration attribute works exactly like the css text decoration property except that it's an attribute. See css text decoration for further information.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration 属性的作用完全象 css text decoration ，除了它是一个特性属性。有关更多信息，请参见 css text decoration 。

trans-unit.source: The textLength attribute, available on SVG <text> and <tspan> elements, lets you specify the width of the space into which the text will draw. The user agent will ensure that the text does not extend farther than that distance, using the method or methods specified by the lengthAdjust attribute. By default, only the spacing between characters is adjusted, but the glyph size can also be adjusted if you change lengthAdjust.
trans-unit.target: 在SVG <text> 和 <tspan> 元素上可用的 textLength 属性使您可以指定文本要绘制到的空间的宽度。所述用户代理将确保文本不延伸远于该距离，使用由规定的方法或方法 lengthAdjust 属性。默认情况下，仅调整字符之间的间距，但是如果更改 lengthAdjust ，则字形大小也可以调整。

trans-unit.source: The transform-origin SVG attribute sets the origin for an item’s transformations.

The transform-origin property may be specified using one, two, or three values, where each value represents an offset. Offsets that are not explicitly defined are reset to their corresponding initial values.
The transform attribute defines a list of transform definitions that are applied to an element and the element's children.
trans-unit.target: 该 transform 属性定义转换应用到一个元素，元素的子定义的列表。

trans-unit.source: The translate(<x> [<y>]) transform function moves the object by x and y (i.e. xnew = xold + <x>, ynew = yold + <y>). If y is not provided, it is assumed to be zero.
trans-unit.target: 的 translate(<x> [<y>]) 通过变换函数移动对象 x 和 y （即 xnew = xold + <x>, ynew = yold + <y> ）。如果未提供 y ，则假定为零。

trans-unit.source: The translate(<x> [<y>]) transform function moves the object by x and y. If y is not provided, it is assumed to be 0.

The tref element allows to reference already defined text, effectively copying it in its place. You can use the xlink:href attribute to point it to an element who's text content is to be taken over. You can then style it and modify it's appearance independent of the source.
trans-unit.target: 该 tref 元素允许引用已定义的文本，有效地复制它在它的位置。您可以使用 xlink:href 属性将其指向要接收其文本内容的元素。然后，您可以设置样式，并独立于源修改其外观。

trans-unit.source: The tspan element has the following custom attributes:
The type attribute is a generic attribute and it has different meaning based on the context in which it's used.
trans-unit.target: 该 type 属性是一个通用的属性，它具有基于在它使用的上下文不同的含义。

trans-unit.source: The u1 attribute specifies list of Unicode characters (refer to the description of the unicode attribute of the <glyph> element for a description of how to express individual Unicode characters) and/or ranges of Unicode characters, which identify a set of possible first glyphs in a kerning pair.

The u2 attribute specifies list of Unicode characters (refer to the description of the unicode attribute of the <glyph> element for a description of how to express individual Unicode characters) and/or ranges of Unicode characters, which identify a set of possible second glyphs in a kerning pair.
The underline-position attribute represents the ideal vertical position of the underline. The underline position is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 该 underline-position 属性表示下划线的理想垂直位置。下划线位置在字体的坐标系中表示。

trans-unit.source: The underline-thickness attribute represents the ideal thickness of the underline. The underline thickness is expressed in the font's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 underline-thickness 属性表示下划线的理想厚度。下划线的粗细以字体的坐标系表示。

trans-unit.source: The unicode-bidi attribute specifies how the accumulation of the background image is managed.
The unicode-range attribute defines the range of ISO 10646 characters possibly covered by the glyphs in a font.

The unicode attribute contributes to the process for deciding which glyph(s) are used to represent which character(s). If the attribute is not provided for a given <glyph>, then the only way to use this glyph is via an <altGlyph> reference.
The unicode attribute specifies one or more Unicode characters indicating the sequence of Unicode characters which corresponds to a glyph.

The units-per-em attribute specifies the number of coordinate units on the "em square", an abstract square whose height is the intended distance between lines of type in the same type size. This is the size of the design grid on which glyphs are laid out.

The v-alphabetic attribute defines indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve alphabetic baseline alignment. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific vert-origin-x attribute.

The v-hanging attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve hanging baseline alignment. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific vert-origin-x attribute.

The v-ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve ideographic baseline alignment for vertically oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific vert-origin-x attribute.

The v-mathematical attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve mathematical baseline alignment for vertically oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific vert-origin-x attribute.

The values attribute has different meanings, depending upon the context where itʼs used, either it defines a sequence of values used over the course of an animation, or itʼs a list of numbers for a color matrix, which is interpreted differently depending on the type of color change to be performed.
The values attribute has two meanings, depending upon the context where it's used.
trans-unit.target: 该 values 属性有两个含义，取决于使用它的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The vector-effect property specifies the vector effect to use when drawing an object. Vector effects are applied before any of the other compositing operations, i.e. filters, masks and clips.
The vector-effect property specifies the vector effect to use when drawing an object. Vector effects are applied before any of the other compositing operations: filters, masks and clips.
trans-unit.target: 的 vector-effect 绘制对象时属性指定要使用的载体的作用。在其他任何合成操作之前应用矢量效果：滤镜，蒙版和剪辑。

trans-unit.source: The version attribute is used to indicate what specification a SVG document conforms to. It is only allowed on the root <svg> element. It is purely advisory and has no influence on rendering or processing.
trans-unit.target: 该 version 属性用于指示哪些规范SVG文件符合。仅允许在根<svg>元素上使用。它纯粹是建议性的，对渲染或处理没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The version attribute is used to indicate what specification a SVG document conforms to. It is only allowed on the root <svg> element. It is purely advisory and has no influence on rendering or processing.
The vert-adv-y attribute indicates the vertical advance after rendering a glyph in vertical orientation.
The vert-origin-x attribute indicates the x-coordinate in the font coordinate system of the origin of a glyph to be used when drawing vertically oriented text.
The vert-origin-y attribute indicates the y-coordinate in the font coordinate system of the origin of a glyph to be used when drawing vertically oriented text.
The viewBox attribute defines the position and dimension, in user space, of an SVG viewport.
trans-unit.target: 所述 viewBox 属性定义了位置和尺寸，在用户空间中，SVG视口。

trans-unit.source: The viewBox attribute establishes a logical coordinate system which the SVG picture's coordinates are relative to. In this case our picture is laid out in a 100 by 100 viewport.
The visibility attribute lets you control the visibility of graphical elements. With a value of hidden or collapse the current graphics element is invisible.
trans-unit.target: 该 visibility 属性可以让你控制图形元素的可见性。值为 hidden 或 collapse ，当前图形元素不可见。

trans-unit.source: The width attribute defines the horizontal length of an element in the user coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 width 属性定义的元素的在用户的水平长度的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The widths attribute indicates a list of range values, each followed by one or more glyph widths.
The word-spacing attribute specifies spacing behavior between words.
trans-unit.target: 的 word-spacing 属性指定间距字之间的行为。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode attribute specifies whether the initial inline-progression-direction for a <text> element shall be left-to-right, right-to-left, or top-to-bottom. The writing-mode attribute applies only to <text> elements; the attribute is ignored for <tspan>, <tref>, <altGlyph> and <textPath> sub-elements. (Note that the inline-progression-direction can change within a <text> element due to the Unicode bidirectional algorithm and properties direction and unicode-bidi.
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 属性指定了所述初始直列进展方向是否 <text> 元素应当被左到右，从右到左，或顶部至底部。在 writing-mode 属性仅适用于 <text> 元素;对于 <tspan> ， <tref> ， <altGlyph> 和 <textPath> 子元素，该属性将被忽略。 （请注意，由于Unicode双向算法，属性 direction 和 unicode-bidi ，所以inline-progression-direction可以在 <text> 元素内更改。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode attribute specifies whether the initial inline-progression-direction for a <text> element shall be left-to-right, right-to-left, or top-to-bottom. The writing-mode attribute applies only to <text> elements; the attribute is ignored for <tspan>, <tref>, <altGlyph> and <textPath> sub-elements. (Note that the inline-progression-direction can change within a <text> element due to the Unicode bidirectional algorithm and properties direction and unicode-bidi.)
The x-height attribute indicates the height of lowercase glyphs in the font within the font coordinate system.
The x1 attribute is used to specify the first x-coordinate for drawing an SVG element that requires more than one coordinate. Elements that only need one coordinate use the x attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 所述 x1 属性用来指定用于绘制需要多于一个的坐标的SVG元素第一x坐标。只需要一个坐标的元素改用 x 属性。

trans-unit.source: The x2 attribute is used to specify the second x-coordinate for drawing an SVG element that requires more than one coordinate. Elements that only need one coordinate use the x attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 x2 属性用来指定用于绘制需要多于一个的坐标的SVG元素的第二x坐标。只需要一个坐标的元素改用 x 属性。

trans-unit.source: The x and y attributes determine, where in the viewport the text will appear. The attribute text-anchor, which can have the values "start", "middle", "end" or "inherit", decides in which direction the text flows from this point. The attribute dominant-baseline decides the vertical alignment.
trans-unit.target: 在 x 和 y 属性决定，在视口中的文字就会出现。属性 text-anchor 可以具有值“ start”，“ middle”，“ end”或“ heritit”，它决定文本从该点向哪个方向流动。属性 dominant-baseline 决定垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The x attribute defines a x-axis coordinate in the user coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 的 x 属性定义X轴坐标在用户坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The xChannelSelector attribute indicates which color channel from in2 to use to displace the pixels in in along the x-axis.
The xlink:arcrole attribute specifies a contextual role for the element and corresponds to the RDF Primer notion of a property.
The xlink:href attribute defines a link to a resource as a reference <IRI>. The exact meaning of that link depends on the context of each element using it. See above for more specific usage.
trans-unit.target: 所述 xlink:href 属性定义链接到一个资源作为参考<IRI> 。该链接的确切含义取决于使用它的每个元素的上下文。有关更多具体用法，请参见上文。

trans-unit.source: The xlink:href attribute defines a reference to a resource as a reference IRI. The exact meaning of that link depends on the context of each element using it.
The xlink:href attribute specifies the location of the referenced font.
trans-unit.target: 所述 xlink:href 属性指定引用的字体的位置。

trans-unit.source: The xlink:show attribute indicates how a linked resource should be opened and is meant for XLink-aware processors. In case of a conflict, the target attribute has priority, since it can express a wider range of values.

The xlink:title attribute is used to describe the meaning of a link or resource in a human-readable fashion, along the same lines as the xlink:role or xlink:arcrole attribute. A value is optional; if a value is supplied, it shall contain a string that describes the resource. In general it is preferable to use a <title> child element rather than a xlink:title attribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 xlink:title 属性用于描述在一个人可读方式的链路或资源的意义，沿着相同的线作为 xlink:role 或 xlink:arcrole 属性。值是可选的；如果提供了值，则该值应包含描述资源的字符串。通常，最好使用 <title> 子元素而不是 xlink:title 属性。

trans-unit.source: The xlink:title attribute is used to describe the meaning of a link or resource in a human-readable fashion.
The xlink:type attribute identifies the type of XLink being used. In SVG, only simple links are available.
The xml:lang attribute specifies the primary language used in contents and attributes containing text content of particular elements.
The y1 attribute is used to specify the first y-coordinate for drawing an SVG element that requires more than one coordinate. Elements that only need one coordinate use the y attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 的 y1 属性用来指定用于绘制需要多于一个的坐标的SVG元素的第一y坐标。只需要一个坐标的元素改用 y 属性。

trans-unit.source: The y2 attribute is used to specify the second y-coordinate for drawing an SVG element that requires more than one coordinate. Elements that only need one coordinate use the y attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 的 y2 属性用来指定用于绘制需要多于一个的坐标的SVG元素的第二y坐标。只需要一个坐标的元素改用 y 属性。

trans-unit.source: The y attribute defines a y-axis coordinate in the user coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 所述 y 属性定义在用户y轴坐标的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The yChannelSelector attribute indicates which color channel from in2 to use to displace the pixels in in along the y-axis.

The z attribute defines the location along the Z-axis for a light source in the coordinate system established by the primitiveUnits attribute on the <filter> element, assuming that, in the initial coordinate system, the positive Z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the Z-axis equals one unit in X and Z.
trans-unit.target: 所述 z 属性限定沿Z轴的位置，以由所建立的坐标系中的光源 primitiveUnits 的上属性 <filter> 元件，假设，初始坐标系中，正Z轴出来朝向人查看内容并假定沿Z轴的一个单位等于X和Z中的一个单位。

trans-unit.source: The z attribute defines the location along the z-axis for a light source in the coordinate system established by the primitiveUnits attribute on the <filter> element, assuming that, in the initial coordinate system, the positive z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the z-axis equals one unit in x and y.

trans-unit.source: The PNG format is recommended because it supports the ability to define a transparency mask via an alpha channel. If a different image format is used, this format should support the definition of a transparency mask (two options: provide an explicit alpha channel or use a particular pixel color to indicate transparency). If the transparency mask can be determined, the mask defines the shape of the cursor; otherwise, the cursor is an opaque rectangle. Typically, the other pixel information (e.g., the R, G and B channels) defines the colors for those parts of the cursor which are not masked out. Note that cursors usually contain at least two colors so that the cursor can be visible over most backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用PNG格式,因为它支持通过alpha通道定义透明度蒙版的能力。如果使用不同的图像格式,这种格式应该支持定义透明度掩码(有两种选择:提供一个明确的alpha通道或使用特定的像素颜色来表示透明度)。如果可以确定透明度掩码,则掩码定义了光标的形状;否则,光标是一个不透明的矩形。通常情况下,其他像素信息(如R、G和B通道)定义了光标中未被遮蔽的部分的颜色。请注意,光标通常至少包含两种颜色,这样光标就可以在大多数背景上可见。

trans-unit.source: The SVG <image> element allows for raster images to be rendered within an SVG object.
trans-unit.target: SVG <image> 元素允许在SVG对象中渲染栅格图像。

trans-unit.source: The SVG <animate> element provides a way to animate an attribute of an element over time.
The SVG <animateMotion> element let define how an element moves along a motion path.
The SVG <feDropShadow> filter primitive creates a drop shadow of the input image. It can only be used inside a <filter> element.
The SVG <set> element provides a simple means of just setting the value of an attribute for a specified duration.
The SVG <stop> element defines a color and its position to use on a gradient. This element is always a child of a <linearGradient> or <radialGradient> element.
The SVG <style> element allows style sheets to be embedded directly within SVG content.
The SVG <text> element defines a graphics element consisting of text. It's possible to apply a gradient, pattern, clipping path, mask, or filter to <text>, just like any other SVG graphics element.
trans-unit.target: SVG <text> 元素定义了一个由文本组成的图形元素。像其他任何SVG图形元素一样，可以对 <text> 应用渐变，图案，剪切路径，蒙版或过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The SVG <text> element draws a graphics element consisting of text. It's possible to apply a gradient, pattern, clipping path, mask, or filter to <text>, like any other SVG graphics element.
The SVG <tspan> element defines a subtext within a <text> element or another <tspan> element. It allows for adjustment of the style and/or position of that subtext as needed.
The SVG script element allows to add scripts to an SVG document.
The SVG conditional processing attributes are all the attributes that can be specified on some SVG elements to control whether or not the element on which it appears should be rendered.
The SVG core attributes are all the common attributes that can be specified on any SVG element.
The SVG document links the stylesheet in the usual way.
trans-unit.target: SVG文档以通常的方式链接样式表。

There is some discussion about what rules apply to such referenced elements.
The SVG styling attributes are all the attributes that can be specified on any SVG element to apply CSS styling effects.
The SVG viewport coordinates for the current SVG fragment.

The URL must point to exactly one target element which is capable of being the target of the given animation element. If the URL points to multiple target elements, if the given target element is not capable of being a target of the given animation element, or if the given target element is not part of the current document, then the animation element will not affect any target element. However, the animation element will still operate normally with regard to its timing properties. Specifically, TimeEvents are dispatched and the animation element can be used as syncbase in an identical fashion to when the URL refers to a valid target element.
trans-unit.target: URL必须准确地指向一个目标元素,这个目标元素能够成为指定动画元素的目标。如果URL指向多个目标元素,如果给定的目标元素不能成为给定动画元素的目标,或者给定的目标元素不是当前文档的一部分,那么动画元素将不会影响任何目标元素。但是,动画元素仍然会对其定时属性进行正常操作。具体来说,时间事件(TimeEvents)会被派遣,动画元素可以作为同步基地使用,其方式与URL引用有效目标元素时相同。

trans-unit.source: The above rectangle will be painted half-transparent. For the fill and stroke there are two separate attributes, fill-opacity and stroke-opacity, that control each of those property opacities separately. Note, that the stroke will be painted on top of the filling. Hence, if you set a stroke opacity on an element, that also has a fill, the fill will shine through on half of the stroke, while on the other half the background will appear:
trans-unit.target: 上面的矩形将被绘制为半透明。对于fill和stroke，有两个单独的属性， fill-opacity 和 stroke-opacity ，它们分别控制这些属性不透明度。请注意，笔划将被绘制在填充的顶部。因此，如果您在也具有填充的元素上设置了笔触不透明度，则填充将在笔触的一半上照亮，而在另一半背景上将显示：

trans-unit.source: The actual glyphs are then defined by <glyph> elements. The most important attribute is unicode. It defines the unicode codepoint represented by this glyph. If you also specify the lang attribute on a glyph, you can further restrict it to certain languages (represented by xml:lang on the target) exclusively. Again, you can use arbitrary SVG to define the glyph, which allows for great effects in supporting user agents.
trans-unit.target: 实际的字形然后由 <glyph> 元素定义。最重要的属性是 unicode 。它定义了此字形表示的unicode码点。如果还在字形上指定 lang 属性，则可以将其进一步限制为某些语言（由目标上的 xml:lang 表示）。同样，您可以使用任意SVG来定义字形，从而在支持用户代理方面产生了很大的效果。

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be alphabetic, the derived baseline-table is constructed using the alphabetic baseline-table in the font, and the baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.
trans-unit.target: 为显性基线的基线标识符被设定为 alphabetic ，派生基线表使用所构建的 alphabetic 基线表中的字体，以及基线表字体大小被改变成的值 font-size 此元素上的属性。

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be central. The derived baseline-table is constructed from the defined baselines in a baseline-table in the font. That font baseline-table is chosen using the following priority order of baseline-table names: ideographic, alphabetic, hanging, mathematical. The baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.
trans-unit.target: 优势基线的基线标识符设置为 central 。导出的基线表由字体的基线表中的已定义基线构成。使用以下基线表名称优先级顺序选择字体基线表： ideographic ， alphabetic ， hanging ， mathematical 。基线表的字体大小更改为该元素上的 font-size 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be hanging, the derived baseline-table is constructed using the hanging baseline-table in the font, and the baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be ideographic, the derived baseline-table is constructed using the ideographic baseline-table in the font, and the baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be mathematical, the derived baseline-table is constructed using the mathematical baseline-table in the font, and the baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be middle. The derived baseline-table is constructed from the defined baselines in a baseline-table in the font. That font baseline-table is chosen using the following priority order of baseline-table names: alphabetic, ideographic, hanging, mathematical. The baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.

The baseline-table font-size is changed to the value of the font-size attribute on this element.

trans-unit.source: The baseline-identifier for the dominant-baseline is set to be text-before-edge.
