trans-unit.source: The basic type <color> is a CSS2 compatible specification for a color in the sRGB color space. <color> applies to SVG's use of the color attribute and is a component of the definitions of attributes fill, stroke, stop-color, flood-color and lighting-color, which also offer optional ICC-based color specifications.

trans-unit.source: The caveat here is that if the object changes size, the pattern itself will scale to fit it, but the objects inside will not. So while we would still have 4 repeating units inside the pattern, the objects composing that pattern would remain the same size, and you end up with large areas of nothing in between them. By changing the patternContentUnits attribute, we can put all the elements into the same unit system:
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是，如果对象改变大小，则图案本身会缩放以适合它，但内部的对象不会缩放。因此，尽管我们在模式中仍然有4个重复单元，但组成该模式的对象将保持相同的大小，并且最终在它们之间没有任何大区域。通过更改 patternContentUnits 属性，我们可以将所有元素放入同一单位系统中：

trans-unit.source: The color-interpolation property chooses between color operations occurring in the sRGB color space or in a (light energy linear) linearized RGB color space. Having chosen the appropriate color space, component-wise linear interpolation is used.

The confusing thing about patterns is defining a unit system and their size. The current mapping (for a single element or the whole image) of user units to screen units is called user coordinate system. Apart from scaling the coordinate system can also be rotated, skewed and flipped. The default user coordinate system maps one user pixel to one device pixel. (However, the device may decide, what it understands as one pixel.) Lengths in the SVG file with specific dimensions, like "in" or "cm", are then calculated in a way that makes them appear 1:1 in the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: 用户单元到屏幕单元的当前映射（对于单个元素或整个图像）称为用户坐标系。除了缩放外，坐标系还可以旋转，倾斜和翻转。默认的用户坐标系将一个用户像素映射到一个设备像素。（但是，设备可能会决定将其理解为一个像素。）然后以某种方式计算SVG文件中的长度，例如“ in”或“ cm”，以使它们在结果中以1：1的方式显示。图片。

The dominant-baseline and the baseline-table components are set by determining the predominant script of the character data content. The writing-mode, whether horizontal or vertical, is used to select the appropriate set of baseline-tables and the dominant baseline is used to select the baseline-table that corresponds to that baseline. The baseline-table font-size component is set to the value of the font-size attribute on the element on which the dominant-baseline attribute occurs.
trans-unit.target: 通过确定字符数据内容的主要脚本来设置主要基线和基线表组件。在 writing-mode ，无论是水平或垂直的，被用来选择适当的一组基线表和主导基线用于选择基准表，其对应于基线。将基线表的字体大小组件设置为出现 dominant-baseline 属性的元素上的 font-size 属性的值。

The example above creates nine Cubic Bezier curves. As the curves move toward the right, the control points become spread out horizontally. As the curves move downward, they become further separated from the end points. The thing to note here is that the curve starts in the direction of the first control point, and then bends so that it arrives along the direction of the second control point.
trans-unit.target: 上面的例子创建了九条立方体贝塞尔曲线。当曲线向右移动时,控制点在水平方向上变得分散。当曲线向下移动时,它们与端点的距离变得更远。这里要注意的是,曲线从第一个控制点的方向开始,然后弯曲,使其沿着第二个控制点的方向到达。

trans-unit.source: The example above creates nine cubic Bézier curves. As the curves move toward the right, the control points become spread out horizontally. trans-unit.source: The example shows a <path> element that goes diagonally across the page. At its center, two elliptical arcs have been cut out (x radius = 30, y radius = 50). In the first one, the x-axis-rotation has been left at 0, so the ellipse that the arc travels around (shown in gray) is oriented straight up and down. For the second arc, though, the x-axis-rotation is set to -45 degrees. This rotates the ellipse so that it is aligned with its minor axis along the path direction, as shown by the second ellipse in the example image.

The example shows a path element that goes diagonally across the page. At its center, two elliptical arcs have been cut out (x radius = 30, y radius = 50). For the second arc, though, the x-axis-rotation is set to -45 degrees. This rotates the ellipse so that it is aligned with its minor axis along the path direction, as shown by the second ellipse in the example image.

trans-unit.source: The first important thing to notice is the order of rendering elements. The globally valid rule for SVG files is, that later elements are rendered atop previous elements. The further down an element is the more it will be visible.

By specifying value(s) for kernelUnitLength, the kernel becomes defined in a scalable, abstract coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the x and y values represent very small deltas relative to a given position, which might be implemented in some cases as one pixel in the intermediate image offscreen bitmap, which is a pixel-based coordinate system, and thus potentially not scalable.

The first number specifies a distance for the filled area, and the second a distance for the unfilled area. So in the above example, the second path fills 5 pixel units, with 5 blank units until the next dash of 5 units. You can specify more numbers if you would like a more complicated dash pattern. The first example specifies three numbers, in which case the renderer loops the numbers twice to create an even pattern. So the first path renders 5 filled, 10 empty, 5 filled, and then loops back to create 5 empty, 10 filled, 5 empty. The pattern then repeats.
trans-unit.target: 第一个数字指定了填充区域的距离,第二个数字指定了未填充区域的距离。所以在上面的例子中,第二条路径填充5个像素单位,有5个空白单位,直到下一个5个单位的破折号。如果你想要更复杂的破折号模式,你可以指定更多的数字。第一个例子指定了三个数字,在这种情况下,渲染器会将这些数字循环两次以创建一个偶数图案。因此,第一条路径渲染5个填充、10个空、5个填充,然后再循环创建5个空、10个填充、5个空。然后,该模式重复进行。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter for all the DOM2 namespace aware methods must be the namespace name (also known as the namespace URI) of the element or parameter in question. For SVG elements this is 'http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'. However, note carefully: the Namespaces in XML 1.1 recommendation states that the namespace name for parameters without a prefix does not have a value. In other words, although the parameters belong to the namespace of the element, you do not use the tag's namespace name. In some cases the feature strings map directly to a set of attributes, properties or elements, in others they represent some functionality of the browser. Note that the format and naming for feature strings changed from SVG 1.0 to SVG 1.1. The SVG 1.0 feature strings are not listed here but can be found in the SVG Specification. trans-unit.source: The following transform functions can be used by the transform attribute <transform-list>

The format of an RGB value in hexadecimal notation is a "#" immediately followed by either three or six hexadecimal characters. The three-digit RGB notation (#rgb) is converted into six-digit form (#rrggbb) by replicating digits, not by adding zeros. For example, #fb0 expands to #ffbb00. This ensures that white (#ffffff) can be specified with the short notation (#fff) and removes any dependencies on the color depth of the display. The format of an RGB value in the functional notation is an RGB start-function followed by a comma-separated list of three numerical values (either three integer values or three percentage values) followed by ")". An RGB start-function is the case-insensitive string "rgb(", for example "RGB(" or "rGb(". For compatibility, the all-lowercase form "rgb(" is preferred. The integer value 255 corresponds to 100%, and to F or FF in the hexadecimal notation: rgb(255,255,255) = rgb(100%,100%,100%) = #FFF. White space characters are allowed around the numerical values. All RGB colors are specified in the sRGB color space. Using sRGB provides an unambiguous and objectively measurable definition of the color, which can be related to international standards.
trans-unit.target: 十六进制表示形式的RGB值格式为“＃”，紧随其后的是三个或六个十六进制字符。三位RGB表示法（#rgb）通过复制数字而不是通过加零转换为六位形式（#rrggbb）。例如， #fb0 扩展为 #ffbb00 。这样可以确保可以使用短符号（ #fff ）指定白色（ #ffffff ）），并删除与显示器颜色深度的任何依赖关系。功能符号中RGB值的格式是RGB起始函数，后跟一个逗号分隔的三个数值列表（三个整数值或三个百分比值），后跟“）”。 RGB起始函数是不区分大小写的字符串“ rgb（”，例如“ RGB（”或“ rGb（”。出于兼容性考虑，最好使用全小写形式“ rgb（”。整数值255对应于100 ％，并以十六进制表示法表示为F或FF： rgb(255,255,255) = rgb(100%,100%,100%) = #FFF 。数值周围允许使用空格字符。所有RGB颜色均在sRGB颜色空间中指定。使用sRGB可提供颜色的明确且客观可测量的定义，该定义可能与国际标准有关。

trans-unit.source: The format of an RGB value in hexadecimal notation is a "#" immediately followed by either three or six hexadecimal characters. The three-digit RGB notation (#rgb) is converted into six-digit form (#rrggbb) by replicating digits, not by adding zeros. For example, #fb0 expands to #ffbb00. This ensures that white (#ffffff) can be specified with the short notation (#fff) and removes any dependencies on the color depth of the display. The format of an RGB value in the functional notation is an RGB start-function, followed by a comma-separated list of three numerical values (either three integer values or three percentage values) followed by ")". An RGB start-function is the case-insensitive string "rgb(", for example "RGB(" or "rGb(". For compatibility, the all-lowercase form "rgb(" is preferred. The integer value 255 corresponds to 100%, and to F or FF in the hexadecimal notation: rgb(255,255,255) = rgb(100%,100%,100%) = #FFF. White space characters are allowed around the numerical values. All RGB colors are specified in the sRGB color space. Using sRGB provides an unambiguous and objectively measurable definition of the color, which can be related to international standards.
The format of the given font.
The formula for the transformation looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 转换的公式是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The four different paths mentioned above are determined by the next two argument flags. As mentioned earlier, there are still two possible ellipses for the path to travel around and two different possible paths on both ellipses, giving four possible paths. The first argument is the large-arc-flag. It simply determines if the arc should be greater than or less than 180 degrees; in the end, this flag determines which direction the arc will travel around a given circle. The second argument is the sweep-flag. It determines if the arc should begin moving at positive angles or negative ones, which essentially picks which of the two circles you will travel around. The example below shows all four possible combinations, along with the two circles for each case.

trans-unit.source: The keySplines attribute defines a set of Bézier control points associated with the keyTimes list, defining a cubic Bézier function that controls interval pacing. Each control point description is a set of four values: x1 y1 x2 y2, describing the Bézier control points for one time segment. The keyTimes values that define the associated segment are the Bézier "anchor points", and the keySplines values are the control points. Thus, there must be one fewer sets of control points than there are keyTimes.

The Bézier function then creates a smooth curve that transfers from the slope established at the beginning of the line, to the slope at the other end.

For an element with a vertical primary text direction (often typical for Asian text), the top side of the text is rendered at the initial text position.

For an element with a vertical primary text direction (often typical for Asian text), the bottom of the text is rendered at the initial text position.

trans-unit.source: The two possible values for the attribute are spacing and spacingAndGlyphs. Using spacing (the default), the letter forms are preserved, but the space between them grows or shrinks. Using spacingAndGlyphs, the entire text element is stretched or compressed in the direction of the text.

The use of symbol elements for graphics that are used multiple times in the same document adds structure and semantics. Documents that are rich in structure may be rendered graphically, as speech, or as Braille, and thus promote accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 在同一文档中多次使用图形的 symbol 元素会增加结构和语义。结构丰富的文档可以图形化显示为语音或盲文，从而提高了可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The use of this information is highly dependent on the type of processing being done. It may be used, for example, to make titles available to applications used by visually impaired users, or to create a table of links, or to present help text that appears when a user lets a mouse pointer hover over a starting resource.
The value "non-scaling-stroke" is a keyword for a predefined vector effect that causes an object's stroke-width to be unaffected by transformations and zooming.
trans-unit.target: 值“ non-scaling-stroke ”是预定义矢量效果的关键字，该效果使对象的笔触宽度不受变换和缩放的影响。

trans-unit.source: The value "non-scaling-stroke" is designed so that it can be implemented without the entire vector effect engine. For example, profiles of SVG may restrict the values of vector-effect to be "default" or "non-scaling-stroke". In effect this requires no processing of vector effects, rather it is always the default rendering order with a different set of transformations.
trans-unit.target: 值“ non-scaling-stroke ”经过设计，可以在没有整个矢量效果引擎的情况下实现。例如，SVG的配置文件可能会将矢量效果的值限制为“默认”或“非缩放描边”。实际上，这不需要处理矢量效果，而是始终是具有不同变换集的默认渲染顺序。

trans-unit.source: The value auto defines a clipping path along the bounds of the viewport created by the given element.
trans-unit.target: 值 auto 定义沿给定元素创建的视口边界的剪切路径。

trans-unit.source: The value auto defines a clipping path along the bounds of the viewport created by the given element.The value rect() defines a clipping rectangle following the following syntax: rect(<top>, <right>, <bottom>, <left>). The <top> and <bottom> values specify offsets from the top border edge of the element viewport, while <right> and <left> specify offsets from the left border edge of the element viewport.

The value evenodd determines the "insideness" of a point in the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses. If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 值 evenodd 通过在任意方向上从该点绘制到无限远的光线并计算从该光线穿过的给定形状计算出的路径段数来确定形状中某个点的“内部”。如果这个数字是奇数，则该点在内部；否则，该点在内部。即使是，重点也在外面。

trans-unit.source: The value nonzero determines the "insideness" of a point in the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a path segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path. Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: nonzero 值通过在任意方向上从该点向无限远处绘制射线，然后检查形状的一部分与该射线相交的位置来确定形状中某个点的“内部”。从零开始，每次路径段从左到右穿过光线时加一，而每次路径段从右到左穿过光线时减一。在计算交叉点之后，如果结果为零，则该点位于路径之外。否则，它在里面。

trans-unit.source: The value nonzero determines the "insideness" of a point in the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction, and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a path segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path. Otherwise, it is inside.

The value rect() defines a clipping rectangle following the following syntax: rect(<top>, <right>, <bottom>, <left>). The <top> and <bottom> values specify offsets from the top border edge of the element viewport, while <right> and <left> specify offsets from the left border edge of the element viewport.
trans-unit.target: 值 rect() 遵循以下语法定义了一个裁剪矩形： rect(<top>, <right>, <bottom>, <left>) 。所述 <top> 和 <bottom> 值从指定的偏移量上边框边缘的元件的视口的，而 <right> 和 <left> 从指定偏移左边界边缘元素视口。

trans-unit.source: The value can be either one of the six keywords defined below, or a string which matches a previous result attribute value within the same <filter> element. If no value is provided and this is the first filter primitive, then this filter primitive will use SourceGraphic as its input. If no value is provided and this is a subsequent filter primitive, then this filter primitive will use the result from the previous filter primitive as its input.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是下面定义的六个关键字之一，也可以是与同一 <filter> 元素中的先前 result 属性值匹配的字符串。如果没有提供值，并且这是第一个过滤器原语，则此过滤器原语将使用 SourceGraphic 作为其输入。如果没有提供任何值，并且这是后续的过滤器原语，则此过滤器原语会将前一个过滤器原语的结果用作其输入。

The value is in the font coordinate system. This attribute is required.
The value is the dominant-baseline of the script to which the character belongs - i.e., use the dominant-baseline of the parent.

The value of the viewBox attribute is a list of four numbers min-x, min-y, width and height, separated by whitespace and/or a comma, which specify a rectangle in user space which is mapped to the bounds of the viewport established for the associated element.
trans-unit.target: viewBox 属性的值是四个数字 min-x ， min-y ， width 和 height 的列表，用空格和/或逗号分隔，这些数字指定用户空间中的矩形，该矩形映射到已建立的视口的边界用于关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: The whole SVG canvas here is 200px by 200px in size. However, the viewBox attribute defines the portion of that canvas to display. This effectively zooms in on the 100x100 unit area and enlarges the image to double size.

There are a number of drawing applications available such as Inkscape which are free and use SVG as their native file format. However, this tutorial will rely on the trusty XML or text editor (your choice). The idea is to teach the internals of SVG to those who want to understand it, and that is best done by dirtying your hands with a bit of markup. You should note your final goal though. Not all SVG viewers are equal and so there is a good chance that something written for one app will not display exactly the same in another, simply because they support different levels of the SVG specification or another specification that you are using along with SVG (that is, JavaScript or CSS).
trans-unit.target: 有许多可用的绘图应用程序（例如Inkscape）是免费的，并且使用SVG作为其本机文件格式。但是，本教程将依靠可靠的XML或文本编辑器（您的选择）。这个想法是向那些想了解SVG的人讲授SVG的内部原理，最好的方法是用一些标记弄脏您的手。您应该注意最终目标。并非所有的SVG查看器都是平等的，因此，为一个应用程序编写的内容在另一个应用程序中显示的效果很可能不完全相同，这仅仅是因为它们支持不同级别的SVG规范或您正在与SVG一起使用的另一个规范。是JavaScript或CSS）。

trans-unit.source: There are additional stroke and fill properties available, including fill-rule, which specifies how to color in shapes that overlap themselves; stroke-miterlimit, which determines if a stroke should draw miters; and stroke-dashoffset, which specifies where to start a dasharray on a line.
trans-unit.target: 还有其他可用的笔触和填充属性，包括 fill-rule, 它指定如何对重叠的形状进行着色。 stroke-miterlimit ，它确定笔划是否应该拉出斜边；和stroke-dashoffset，指定在一行上从何处开始dasharray。

It takes two parameters, a coordinate (x) and coordinate (y) to move to. If the cursor was already somewhere on the page, no line is drawn to connect the two positions. The "Move To" command appears at the beginning of paths to specify where the drawing should start. For example:

If your cursor already was somewhere on the page, no line is drawn to connect the two places. The "Move To" command appears at the beginning of paths to specify where the drawing should start. e.g. :

trans-unit.source: There are several basic shapes used for most SVG drawing. The purpose of these shapes is fairly obvious from their names. Some of the attributes that determine their position and size are given, but an element reference would probably contain more accurate and complete descriptions along with other properties that won't be covered in here. However, since they're used in most SVG documents, it's necessary to give them some sort of introduction.
trans-unit.target: 有几种基本形状用于大多数SVG绘图。这些形状的目的从它们的名称上就可以看出。我们给出了一些决定它们位置和大小的属性,但元素参考可能会包含更准确和完整的描述以及其他属性,这里不做介绍。然而,由于它们在大多数SVG文档中使用,所以有必要对它们进行一些介绍。

trans-unit.source: There are several basic shapes used for most SVG drawing. The purpose of these shapes is fairly obvious from their names. Some of the parameters that determine their position and size are given, but an element reference would probably contain more accurate and complete descriptions along with other properties that won't be covered in here. However, since they're used in most SVG documents, it's necessary to give them some sort of introduction.

There are several ways to color shapes (including specifying attributes on the object) using inline CSS, an embedded CSS section, or an external CSS file. Most SVG you'll find around the web use inline CSS, but there are advantages and disadvantages associated with each type.
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以使用内联CSS，嵌入式CSS部分或外部CSS文件为形状着色（包括在对象上指定属性）。您在网络上可以找到的大多数SVG都使用内联CSS，但是每种类型都有其优点和缺点。

trans-unit.source: There are situations, where basic shapes do not provide the flexibility you need to achieve a certain effect. Drop shadows, to provide a popular example, cannot be created reasonably with a combination of gradients. Filters are SVG's mechanism to create sophisticated effects.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,基本的形状不能提供你所需要的灵活性来实现某种效果。举个很常见的例子,落影,不能用渐变的组合合理地创建。滤镜是SVG创建复杂效果的机制。

trans-unit.source: There are some ingredients required for embedding a font in SVG. Let's show an example declaration (the one from the specification), and explain the details.

trans-unit.source: There are some other caveats for dealing with gradientUnits="objectBoundingBox" when the object bounding box isn't square, but they're fairly complex and will have to wait for someone more in-the-know to explain them.
trans-unit.target: 当对象边界框不是正方形时，还有其他一些需要注意的问题，以解决 gradientUnits="objectBoundingBox" ，但它们相当复杂，将不得不等待更多的有识之士来解释它们。

trans-unit.source: There are three commands that draw lines. The most generic is the "Line To" command, called with L. L takes two parameters—x and y coordinates—and draws a line from the current position to a new position.
trans-unit.target: 有三个命令可以画线。最通用的是“ Line To”命令， called with L 。 L 使用两个参数-x和y坐标-并绘制一条从当前位置到新位置的线。

trans-unit.source: There are three commands that draw lines. The most generic is the "Line To" command, called with L. L takes two parameters—x and y coordinates—and draws a line from the current position to a new position.

There are three different commands that can be used to create smooth curves. Two of those curves are Bézier curves, and the third is an "arc" or part of a circle. You might have already gained practical experience with Bézier curves using path tools in Inkscape, Illustrator or Photoshop. For a complete description of the math behind Bézier curves, go to a reference like the one on Wikipedia. There are an infinite number of Bézier curves, but only two simple ones are available in <path> elements: a cubic one, called with C, and a quadratic one, called with Q.

There are three different commands that you can use to create smooth curves. Two of those curves are Bezier curves, and the third is an "arc" or part of a circle. You might have already gained practical experience with Bezier curves using path tools in Inkscape, Illustrator or Photoshop. For a complete description of the math behind Bezier curves, go to a reference like the one on Wikipedia. There are an infinite number of Bezier curves, but only two simple ones are available in path elements: a cubic one, called with C, and a quadratic one, called with Q.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用三种不同的命令来创建平滑曲线。这些曲线中的两条是贝塞尔曲线，第三条是“弧”或圆的一部分。您可能已经在Inkscape，Illustrator或Photoshop中使用路径工具获得了贝塞尔曲线的实践经验。有关Bezier曲线背后数学的完整描述，请转到Wikipedia上的参考文献。贝塞尔曲线有无数，但路径元素中只有两个简单的曲线：三次曲线（用C表示）和二次曲线（用Q表示）。

There are two further elements that can be defined inside font: <hkern> and <vkern>. Each carries references to at least two characters (attributes u1 and u2) and an attribute k that determines how much the distance between those characters should be decreased. The below example instructs user agents to place the "A" and "V" characters closer together the standard distance between characters.
trans-unit.target: font 内可以定义另外两个元素： <hkern> 和 <vkern> 。每个属性都引用了至少两个字符（属性 u1 和 u2 ）以及一个属性 k ，该属性确定应减少这些字符之间的距离。下面的示例指示用户代理将字符之间的标准距离更靠近地放置“ A”和“ V”字符。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of gradients: linear and radial. You must give the gradient an id attribute; otherwise it can't be referenced by other elements inside the file. Gradients are defined in a defs section as opposed to on a shape itself to promote reusability.

trans-unit.source: This attribute also affects direct rendering into offscreen canvases, such as occurs with masks or clip paths. Thus, setting display="none" on a child of a <mask> will prevent the given child element from being rendered as part of the mask. Similarly, setting display="none" on a child of a <clipPath> element will prevent the given child element from contributing to the clipping path.

This attribute applies to all types of resource references, including style sheets, color profiles and fonts specified by a reference using a <font-face> element or a CSS @font-face specification. In particular, if an element sets externalResourcesRequired="true", then all style sheets must be available since any style sheet might affect the rendering of that element.

trans-unit.target: 这个属性会影响浏览器解析文本内容的方式,从而改变DOM的构建方式。因此,通过DOM API改变这个属性的值可能不会有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示浏览器下载URL而不是导航到URL，因此将提示用户将URL保存为本地文件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is applied only to text written in a horizontal writing-mode.
This attribute is applied only to text written in a vertical writing-mode.
This attribute is ignored if the target attribute value does not support addition, or if the animation element does not repeat.
This attribute is ignored unless the calcMode attribute is set to spline.
This attribute is ignored unless the calcMode is set to spline.
trans-unit.target: 除非 calcMode 设置为 spline ,否则将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is provided for backwards compatibility with SVG 1.1. It provides documentation to XLink-aware processors. In case of a conflict, the target attribute has priority, since it can express a wider range of values.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是为了与SVG 1.1向后兼容。它提供了支持XLink的处理器的文档。在发生冲突的情况下，目标属性具有优先权，因为它可以表示更大范围的值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets authors specify the total length for the path, in user units.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性让作者可以指定路径的总长度,以用户为单位。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets specify how much the begining of the text should be offset from the begining of the path.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以让我们指定文本开头与路径开头的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets specify how space between glyphes should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以指定如何处理字形之间的空格。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets specify the total length for the path, in user units.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以指定路径的总长度,以用户为单位。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets specify the width into which the text will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可让您指定文本的绘制宽度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute lets specify the width of the space into which the text will render.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以指定文本将呈现的空间宽度。

trans-unit.source: This attribute provides additional transformation to the gradient coordinate system.
This attribute provides the minimum SVG language profile that the document requires.
trans-unit.target: 该属性提供了文档所需的最小SVG语言配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute reference a template pattern that provides default values for the <pattern> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性引用模板模式，该模板模式提供 <pattern> 属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute set the orientation of each individual glyph.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性设置了每个单独字形的方向。

trans-unit.source: This attribute sets the default scripting language used to process the value strings in event attributes. This language must be used for all instances of script that do not specify their own scripting language. The value specifies a media type, per MIME Part Two: Media Types [RFC2046].

This attribute sets the default scripting language used to process the value strings in event attributes. This language must be used for all instances of script that do not specify their own scripting language. The value content-type specifies a media type, per MIME Part Two: Media Types [RFC2046]. The default value is application/ecmascript
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置用于处理事件属性中的值字符串的默认脚本语言。该语言必须用于所有未指定其自身脚本语言的脚本实例。值content-type根据MIME第二部分：Media Types [RFC2046]指定一种媒体类型。默认值为 application/ecmascript

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the interpolation mode for the animation. The default mode is linear, however if the attribute does not support linear interpolation (e.g. for strings), the calcMode attribute is ignored and discrete interpolation is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定动画的插值模式。默认模式为线性，但是，如果属性不支持线性插值（例如，对于字符串），则 calcMode 属性将被忽略，并使用离散插值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the maximum value of the active duration.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定活动持续时间的最大值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the media type in the form of a MIME type for the linked URL.
trans-unit.target: 此属性以MIME类型的形式指定链接URL 的媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the minimum value of the active duration.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定活动持续时间的最小值。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the namespace in which the target attribute and its associated values are defined.
trans-unit.target: 该属性指定了定义目标属性及其相关值的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性指定了目标对象与链接对象的关系。

trans-unit.source: This attribute specifies the style sheet language for the given document fragment. The contentStyleType is specified on the <svg> element. By default, if it's not defined, the value is text/css
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定给定文档片段的样式表语言。contentStyleType在 <svg> 元素上指定。默认情况下，如果未定义，则值为 text/css
